text: "Rapper's Delight" is a song by The Sugarhill Gang. It was their first single. It is fourteen minutes and thirty-five seconds long. The single reached number one in the Netherlands and Canada.http://www.collectionscanada.gc.ca/rpm/028020-119.01-e.php?brws_s=1&file;_num=nlc008388.9465a&type;=1&interval;=24&PHPSESSID;=c6btf3r8hs459qqt5ln3o3dcv5 The song made hip hop popular around the world. Rolling Stone magazine put "Rapper's Delight" at number 248 in their 500 Greatest Songs of All Time list. ==References== Category:1979 songs Category:Disco songs
title: Rapper's Delight
